Add metabolites or update their data

Source: R/model_modifications.R
addMetabolite.Rd

The function allows you to add one or more metabolites to a model. When providing the ID of an already existing metabolite, you can use this function to update metabolite information.

Usage

addMetabolite(
  model,
  id,
  comp = NA,
  name = NA,
  chemicalFormula = NA,
  charge = NA,
  CVTerms = NA,
  SBOTerm = rep("SBO:0000247", length(id))
)

Arguments

model

Model of class ModelOrg

id

Character vector with metabolite IDs

comp

Character vector of the metabolites' compartment IDs

name

Character vector for metabolite names

chemicalFormula

Character vector for the metabolites' chemical formulas

charge

Numeric vector for the metabolites' charge

CVTerms

Character vector for the metabolites' CV-Terms

SBOTerm

Character vector for the metabolites' SBO-Terms
